  <script type="text/javascript">
  // <![CDATA[

  function popupCode( url ) {
    window.open(url, "Code", "resizable=yes,scrollbars=yes,toolbar=no,status=no,height=150,width=400")
  }

  function toggleCode( id ) {
    if ( document.getElementById )
      elem = document.getElementById( id );
    else if ( document.all )
      elem = eval( "document.all." + id );
    else
      return false;

    elemStyle = elem.style;

    if ( elemStyle.display != "block" ) {
      elemStyle.display = "block"
    } else {
      elemStyle.display = "none"
    }

    return true;
  }

  // Make codeblocks hidden by default
  document.writeln( "<style type=\"text/css\">div.method-source-code { display: none }</style>" )

  // ]]>
  </script>

  <div id="bodyContent">

  <div id="contextContent">

    <div id="description">
      <p>

This module contains all the methods that are available for interpolation in paths and urls. To add your own (or override an existing one), you can either open this module and define it, or call the Paperclip.interpolates method. 

    </div>

   </div>

    <div id="method-list">

      <h3 class="section-bar">Public Class methods</h3>

      <div id="method-M000094" class="method-detail">
        <a name="M000094"></a>

        <div class="method-heading">
          <a href="Interpolations.src/M000094.html" target="Code" class="method-signature"
            onclick="popupCode('Interpolations.src/M000094.html');return false;">
          <span class="method-name">[]</span><span class="method-args">(name)</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="method-description">
          <p>

Hash access of interpolations. Included only for compatability, and is not intended for normal use. 

        </div>
      </div>

      <div id="method-M000093" class="method-detail">
        <a name="M000093"></a>

        <div class="method-heading">
          <a href="Interpolations.src/M000093.html" target="Code" class="method-signature"
            onclick="popupCode('Interpolations.src/M000093.html');return false;">
          <span class="method-name">[]=</span><span class="method-args">(name, block)</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="method-description">
          <p>

Hash assignment of interpolations. Included only for compatability, and is not intended for normal use. 

        </div>
      </div>

      <div id="method-M000095" class="method-detail">
        <a name="M000095"></a>

        <div class="method-heading">
          <a href="Interpolations.src/M000095.html" target="Code" class="method-signature"
            onclick="popupCode('Interpolations.src/M000095.html');return false;">
          <span class="method-name">all</span><span class="method-args">()</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="method-description">
          <p>

Returns a sorted list of all interpolations. 

        </div>
      </div>

      <div id="method-M000096" class="method-detail">
        <a name="M000096"></a>

        <div class="method-heading">
          <a href="Interpolations.src/M000096.html" target="Code" class="method-signature"
            onclick="popupCode('Interpolations.src/M000096.html');return false;">
          <span class="method-name">interpolate</span><span class="method-args">(pattern, *args)</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="method-description">
          <p>

Perform the actual interpolation. Takes the pattern to interpolate and the arguments to pass, which are the attachment and style name. 

        </div>
      </div>

      <h3 class="section-bar">Public Instance methods</h3>

      <div id="method-M000107" class="method-detail">
        <a name="M000107"></a>

        <div class="method-heading">
          <a href="Interpolations.src/M000107.html" target="Code" class="method-signature"
            onclick="popupCode('Interpolations.src/M000107.html');return false;">
          <span class="method-name">attachment</span><span class="method-args">(attachment, style)</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="method-description">
          <p>

Returns the pluralized form of the attachment name. e.g. &quot;avatars&quot; for an attachment of :avatar 

        </div>
      </div>

      <div id="method-M000103" class="method-detail">
        <a name="M000103"></a>

        <div class="method-heading">
          <a href="Interpolations.src/M000103.html" target="Code" class="method-signature"
            onclick="popupCode('Interpolations.src/M000103.html');return false;">
          <span class="method-name">basename</span><span class="method-args">(attachment, style)</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="method-description">
          <p>

Returns the basename of the file. e.g. &quot;file&quot; for &quot;file.jpg&quot; 

        </div>
      </div>

      <div id="method-M000102" class="method-detail">
        <a name="M000102"></a>

        <div class="method-heading">
          <a href="Interpolations.src/M000102.html" target="Code" class="method-signature"
            onclick="popupCode('Interpolations.src/M000102.html');return false;">
          <span class="method-name">class</span><span class="method-args">(attachment = nil, style = nil)</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="method-description">
          <p>

Returns the underscored, pluralized version of the class name. e.g. &quot;users&quot; for the User class. NOTE: The arguments need to be optional, because some tools fetch all class names. Calling class will return the expected class. 

        </div>
      </div>

      <div id="method-M000104" class="method-detail">
        <a name="M000104"></a>

        <div class="method-heading">
          <a href="Interpolations.src/M000104.html" target="Code" class="method-signature"
            onclick="popupCode('Interpolations.src/M000104.html');return false;">
          <span class="method-name">extension</span><span class="method-args">(attachment, style)</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="method-description">
          <p>

Returns the extension of the file. e.g. &quot;jpg&quot; for &quot;file.jpg&quot; If the style has a format defined, it will return the format instead of the actual extension. 

        </div>
      </div>

      <div id="method-M000097" class="method-detail">
        <a name="M000097"></a>

        <div class="method-heading">
          <a href="Interpolations.src/M000097.html" target="Code" class="method-signature"
            onclick="popupCode('Interpolations.src/M000097.html');return false;">
          <span class="method-name">filename</span><span class="method-args">(attachment, style)</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="method-description">
          <p>

Returns the filename, the same way as &quot;:basename.:extension&quot; would. 

        </div>
      </div>

      <div id="method-M000105" class="method-detail">
        <a name="M000105"></a>

        <div class="method-heading">
          <a href="Interpolations.src/M000105.html" target="Code" class="method-signature"
            onclick="popupCode('Interpolations.src/M000105.html');return false;">
          <span class="method-name">id</span><span class="method-args">(attachment, style)</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="method-description">
          <p>

Returns the id of the instance. 

        </div>
      </div>

      <div id="method-M000106" class="method-detail">
        <a name="M000106"></a>

        <div class="method-heading">
          <a href="Interpolations.src/M000106.html" target="Code" class="method-signature"
            onclick="popupCode('Interpolations.src/M000106.html');return false;">
          <span class="method-name">id_partition</span><span class="method-args">(attachment, style)</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="method-description">
          <p>

Returns the id of the instance in a split path form. e.g. returns 000/001/234 for an id of 1234. 

        </div>
      </div>

      <div id="method-M000101" class="method-detail">
        <a name="M000101"></a>

        <div class="method-heading">
          <a href="Interpolations.src/M000101.html" target="Code" class="method-signature"
            onclick="popupCode('Interpolations.src/M000101.html');return false;">
          <span class="method-name">rails_env</span><span class="method-args">(attachment, style)</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="method-description">
          <p>

Returns the RAILS_ENV constant. 

        </div>
      </div>

      <div id="method-M000100" class="method-detail">
        <a name="M000100"></a>

        <div class="method-heading">
          <a href="Interpolations.src/M000100.html" target="Code" class="method-signature"
            onclick="popupCode('Interpolations.src/M000100.html');return false;">
          <span class="method-name">rails_root</span><span class="method-args">(attachment, style)</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="method-description">
          <p>

Returns the RAILS_ROOT constant. 

        </div>
      </div>

      <div id="method-M000108" class="method-detail">
        <a name="M000108"></a>

        <div class="method-heading">
          <a href="Interpolations.src/M000108.html" target="Code" class="method-signature"
            onclick="popupCode('Interpolations.src/M000108.html');return false;">
          <span class="method-name">style</span><span class="method-args">(attachment, style)</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="method-description">
          <p>

Returns the style, or the default style if nil is supplied. 

        </div>
      </div>

      <div id="method-M000099" class="method-detail">
        <a name="M000099"></a>

        <div class="method-heading">
          <a href="Interpolations.src/M000099.html" target="Code" class="method-signature"
            onclick="popupCode('Interpolations.src/M000099.html');return false;">
          <span class="method-name">timestamp</span><span class="method-args">(attachment, style)</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="method-description">
          <p>

Returns the timestamp as defined by the &lt;attachment&gt;_updated_at field 

        </div>
      </div>

      <div id="method-M000098" class="method-detail">
        <a name="M000098"></a>

        <div class="method-heading">
          <a href="Interpolations.src/M000098.html" target="Code" class="method-signature"
            onclick="popupCode('Interpolations.src/M000098.html');return false;">
          <span class="method-name">url</span><span class="method-args">(attachment, style)</span>
          </a>
        </div>

        <div class="method-description">
          <p>

Returns the interpolated URL. Will raise an error if the url itself contains &quot;:url&quot; to prevent infinite recursion. This interpolation is used in the default :path to ease default specifications. 

        </div>
      </div>

    </div>

  </div>
